Name: Moo'lata
Ingredients: 7.5 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
7.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Scotch soured with lime (works better than lemon) and sweetened with a touch of chocolate liqueur.
History: Created in January 2011 by Yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England after mistakenly taking a bottle of Scotch from the speedwell to make a Mulata Daiquiri . It proved a tasty mistake.
Nutrition: One serving of Moo'lata contains 196 calories
